participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, Alex enjoys exploring the outdoors and is passionate about psychology.
participant_1.background: i walk dogs for a living. i'm also a graduate student. i am an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Playful and energetic, Emily loves to express herself through fashion and music while enjoying her leisure time gaming.
participant_2.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.
